entry.title: Armenian, Azerbaijani commissions meet to discuss missing persons

media:group.media:title: Armenian, Azerbaijani commissions meet to discuss missing persons
media:group.media:description:
üìç Representatives of Armenia and Azerbaijan met to discuss humanitarian issues related to individuals who went missing during the conflict between the two nations. üìç A group of Armenian alcohol producers appealed to domestic and international bodies, including the World Trade Organization, to urgently address what they describe as a growing crisis in the transit of goods through Georgia. üìç The legal proceedings in CivilNet‚Äôs lawsuit against Yerevan Mayor Tigran Avinyan continued yesterday, with both sides presenting their arguments in court.

entry.title: Pashinyan vs. the Church: A War of Words

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan vs. the Church: A War of Words
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of the CivilNet podcast, political commentator Eric Hacopian breaks down the escalating war of words between Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and the Armenian Apostolic Church. While Hacopian acknowledges there are legitimate political critiques to be made of the church, he argues that Pashinyan‚Äôs deeply personal attacks, which rely on salacious and unverified gossip, cross a line. Hacopian frames the controversy as part of a broader trend: the global coarsening of political discourse driven by populism and the unfiltered nature of social media.

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs Syunik Province gets French honorary consulate #shorts

media:group.media:description:
France inaugurated an honorary consulate in the southern town of Syunik, the culmination of planning that began after Azerbaijan‚Äôs 2022 attack in the region.

entry.title: Not just a school but a hub for regional revival

media:group.media:title: Not just a school but a hub for regional revival
media:group.media:description:
Civilnet sits down with Aren Deyirmenjian, the Armenia Representative of the Armenian Missionary Association of America (AMAA), to discuss their groundbreaking educational initiative. From a unique tuition-free private school in Yerevan to an ambitious community-centric cluster model school launching in the border region of Vardenis, AMAA is creating empowering spaces for vulnerable children and their families. Their goal is to provide children with a holistic education along with healthcare, social services, and spiritual values.
0:00- AMAA's unique holistic model for private education 3:30- Expanding to Vardenis 6:25- Education for the future 9:42- Patriotic education 11:31- Attracting quality educators 13:23- Serving Artsakh refugees 14:38- Measuring impact 17:17- Martial education

media:group.media:title: French diplomatic presence arrives in Armenia‚Äôs Syunik province
media:group.media:description:
üìç France opened its long-planned honorary consulate in the southern Armenian town of Goris. üìç Pashinyan escalated his long-running feud with the Armenian Apostolic Church by publicly accusing Catholicos Karekin II of breaking his vow of celibacy. üìç Armenia has approved draft legislation to formally regulate the real estate brokerage sector, aiming to curb tax evasion, raise service standards, and bring transparency to property transactions. üìç Business Week Armenia- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0k42oRMbRIo

entry.title: Inside the U.S. lobbying effort to support Armenia

media:group.media:title: Inside the U.S. lobbying effort to support Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Tim Jemal, president of the non-partisan advocacy organization Global ARM, shares how his organization is reshaping U.S. policy toward Armenia through strategic lobbying and bipartisan outreach. He discusses reversing the anti-Armenian narratives promoted by Azerbaijan's big dollar lobbyists and engaging with the Trump administration on strengthening US-Armenia ties, which in turn will enhance Armenia's security and sovereignty. Jemal assesses what's needed for the Armenian-American community to finally match its influence with real impact.
0:00- Global ARM‚Äôs mission to support Armenia 1:15- Changing the narrative in DC on Armenia 6:30- Armenian-American community underperforming its capabilities 11:30- Relationship with the Trump administration on Armenia 14:07- Azerbaijan‚Äôs strategy in DC 17:20- Supporting ARM Global
